trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Предоставляет данные для <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent"> </xref> событий.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent> event is raised by the designer host for certain actions on a control on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent>События узлом конструктора для определенных действий в элементе управления в рабочей области конструирования.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent> is handled by a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler> delegate method, which takes a ViewEventArgs object as a parameter.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent>Обрабатывается <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler>делегат метода, который принимает в качестве параметра объект ViewEventArgs.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> class supplies a default delegate to handle the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>Класс предоставляет делегат по умолчанию для обработки <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent>.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>

trans-unit.source: Custom control designers override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnClick%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnPaint%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplatedControlDesigner.OnTemplateModeChanged%2A> methods to process those events for the control on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: Переопределение конструкторов пользовательских элементов управления <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnClick%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnPaint%2A>, и <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplatedControlDesigner.OnTemplateModeChanged%2A>методы для обработки этих событий для элемента управления в рабочей области конструирования.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplatedControlDesigner.OnTemplateModeChanged%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnPaint%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnClick%2A>

trans-unit.source: The designer host initializes a ViewEventArgs object for the type of action on the design surface, and then passes the object to the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler> delegate.
trans-unit.target: Узел конструктора инициализирует объект ViewEventArgs для типа действия в области конструктора, а затем передает объект для <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler>делегировать.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.Region%2A> property represents the control designer region that the event applies to.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.Region%2A>Свойство представляет область конструктора элемента управления, к которому применяется событие.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.Region%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A> property of the ViewEventArgs object indicates which type of action: - A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Click> event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A>Свойства объекта ViewEventArgs указывает, какой тип действия: - <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Click>событий.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Click> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A>

trans-unit.source: - A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Paint> event.
trans-unit.target: -A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Paint>событий.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Paint>

trans-unit.source: - A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.TemplateModeChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: -A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.TemplateModeChanged>событий.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.TemplateModeChanged>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventArgs%2A> property supplies the event arguments that are specific to the type of action.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventArgs%2A>Свойство предоставляет аргументы события, относящиеся к тип действия.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventArgs%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, the designer host initializes ViewEventArgs objects as follows: - A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs> object when you click a region.
trans-unit.target: Например, узел конструктора инициализирует объекты ViewEventArgs следующим образом: - <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs>объекта при нажатии кнопки область.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: - A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> object when a control is drawn on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: -A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>объекта при рисовании элемента управления в рабочей области конструирования.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: - A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateModeChangedEventArgs> object when the template editing mode changes for the control on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: -A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateModeChangedEventArgs>объекта при изменении режима редактирования шаблона элемента управления в рабочей области конструирования.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateModeChangedEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: For more information about events and delegates, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
trans-unit.target: Дополнительные сведения о событиях и делегатах см. в разделе [NIB: события и делегаты](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs"></xref> class for the type of view event on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: Инициализирует новый экземпляр <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs"> </xref> класса для типа событий представления в области конструктора.

trans-unit.source: The ViewEventArgs constructor is used by the designer host to initialize a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs> object for the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent> event.
trans-unit.target: Конструктор ViewEventArgs используется узлом конструктора для инициализации <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs>для объекта <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent>событий.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: The designer host passes the initialized <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs> object to the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler> delegate.
trans-unit.target: Узел конструктора передает инициализированный <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs>объект <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler>делегировать.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Typically, `region` is set for <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Click> events, and `null` (`Nothing` in Visual Basic) for <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Paint> and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.TemplateModeChanged> events.
trans-unit.target: Как правило `region` задается для <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Click>события, и `null` (`Nothing` в Visual Basic) для <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Paint>и <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.TemplateModeChanged>события.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.TemplateModeChanged> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Paint> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Click>

trans-unit.source: The type of action that raised the event; used to initialize the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType*>.
trans-unit.target: Тип действия, вызвавшего событие. используется для инициализации <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType*>.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType*>

trans-unit.source: The designer region that the action applies to; used to initialize the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.Region*>.
trans-unit.target: Область конструктора, в которой применяется действие. используется для инициализации <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.Region*>.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.Region*>

trans-unit.source: The event arguments associated with `eventType`; used to initialize the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventArgs*>.
trans-unit.target: Аргументы события, связанные с `eventType`; используется для инициализации <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventArgs*>.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventArgs*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the event arguments that are associated with the action that raised the event.
trans-unit.target: Получает аргументы события, связанные с действием, создавший событие.

trans-unit.source: The EventArgs property supplies the event arguments that are specific to the type of action that is specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Свойство EventArgs предоставляет аргументы события, относящиеся к типу действие, указанное в <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A>свойство.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, when you click a region, the designer host initializes the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A> as a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Click> event, and then initializes the EventArgs property as a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs> object.
trans-unit.target: Например, если щелкнуть область узла конструктора инициализирует <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A>как <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Click>события и инициализирует свойство EventArgs как <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs>объект.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Click> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A>

trans-unit.source: Similarly, the designer host initializes the EventArgs property with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> object for a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Paint> event, or a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateModeChangedEventArgs> object for a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.TemplateModeChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: Аналогичным образом, узел конструктора инициализирует свойство EventArgs с <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>для объекта <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Paint>событий, или <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateModeChangedEventArgs>для объекта <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.TemplateModeChanged>событий.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.TemplateModeChanged> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateModeChangedEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Paint> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: The EventArgs property is initialized by the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: EventArgs свойство инициализируется программой <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.%23ctor%2A>конструктор.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: An EventArgs that contains additional event data that is specific to the type of event.
trans-unit.target: Объект EventArgs, содержащий дополнительные данные, зависящие от типа события.

trans-unit.source: Gets the type of action that raised the event.
trans-unit.target: Возвращает тип действия, вызвавшего событие.

trans-unit.source: The EventType property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs> object indicates which type of action raised the event: - A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Click> event.
trans-unit.target: Свойство EventType <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs>объект указывает, какой тип действия, вызвавшего событие: - <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Click>событий.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Click> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: - A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Paint> event.
trans-unit.target: -A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Paint>событий.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Paint>

trans-unit.source: - A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.TemplateModeChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: -A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.TemplateModeChanged>событий.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.TemplateModeChanged>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventArgs%2A> property supplies the event arguments that are specific to the type of action.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventArgs%2A>Свойство предоставляет аргументы события, относящиеся к тип действия.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventArgs%2A>

trans-unit.source: The EventType property is initialized by the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Тип события свойство инициализируется программой <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.%23ctor%2A>конструктор.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent"></xref> that specifies the type of action that raised the event.
trans-unit.target: Объект <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent"> </xref> , указывающее тип действия, вызвавшего событие.

trans-unit.source: Gets the designer region that the event applies to.
trans-unit.target: Возвращает область конструктора, к которому применяется событие.

trans-unit.source: The Region property represents the control designer region that the event applies to.
trans-unit.target: Свойство Region представляет область конструктора элемента управления, к которому применяется событие.

trans-unit.source: Typically, the Region property is set for <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Click> events, and `null` (`Nothing` in Visual Basic) for <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Paint> and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.TemplateModeChanged> events.
trans-unit.target: Как правило, свойству регион для <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Click>события, и `null` (`Nothing` в Visual Basic) для <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Paint>и <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.TemplateModeChanged>события.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.TemplateModeChanged> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Paint> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Click>

trans-unit.source: The Region property is initialized by the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Свойство Region инициализируется <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.%23ctor%2A>конструктор.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion"></xref> that the action applies to.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion"> </xref> , К которому применяется действие.
